newsitem.title: NETHERLANDS: Dutch PTT Post wins Allergan order.
newsitem.headline: Dutch PTT Post wins Allergan order.

text.p: Dutch PTT Post said on Thursday it had won an order to handle the European logistic operations of U.S. pharmaceuticals group Allergan.
The postal unit of Koninklijke PTT Nederland (KPN) said it would set up a centre for the U.S. firm, from where all warehousing and distribution in Europe would be operated.
For the warehousing activities it would use the specialised pharmaceutical distributor Holland Districare, based in the southern town of Oss, in which PTT Post has a 50 percent interest.
Allergan's distribution in the Benelux, Germany, Austria, Switzerland, France and Eastern Europe would be handled in close cooperation with KPN unit TNT Express Worldwide.
PTT Post said Allergan manufactures most of its products for the European markets in the Irish town of Westport.
No financial details of the logistics order were disclosed.
